content: we will announce minor changes to the Montreal agenda, and additional informal meetings in the social stream

If you'd like to watch the connectathon this morning (and the presentations starting at 11:00 Eastern), you can do so at this link: https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/1370806600520562947 (If you're a track lead or one of those who'll be presenting, please see your email or talk to your track lead for special log-in instructions)
Hi @Lloyd McKenzie is there any video right now on the webinar? - I am just getting a waiting to start message...
